attributes.action: reduce public transport fares to a reasonable level or put funding into research for viable alternatives as current alternatives do not travel very far
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it seems rediculous that on the one hand, we are facing the "credit crunch" which means the economy is slowing. Then fuel prices are rising and we are being told that to save the planet we must use public transport and yet the fares for that are increasing too and there are not cheap long distance alternatives to traveling by car!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
